name: WPX Google Analytics
author: Marek Bosman

sections.description: Adding Google Analytics to your website never has been easier. Just add your analytics ID and the correct asynchronous Javascript code is added to every page. No fiddling around anymore with manually pasting the code in your template.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wpx-google-analytics.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Settings > WPX Google Analytics and paste in your analytics ID
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Language support added

1.0.2

  • Cleaned up the code, removed debug statements that caused issues on certain installations.

1.0.1

  • Added: Forbidden characters are stripped from the domain.

1.0

  • First public release of the plugin.

short_description: Activate asynchronous Google Analytics tracking code on your site. Just add your ID and the code appears on the right spot.
description: Adding Google Analytics to your website never has been easier. Just add your analytics ID and the correct asynchronous Javascript code is added to every page. No fiddling around anymore with manually pasting the code in your template.
